web_snippets: Steven Puri. Helping remote workers focus, finish faster & feel healthy. Founder, The Sukha Company | ex-studio exec/producer @ Fox, DreamWorks, ...
We're excited to introduce you to the always interesting and insightful Steven Puri. We hope you'll enjoy our conversation with Steven below.
Steven Puri, the Founder and CEO of The Sukha Company. His mission is to help millions of people find their focus, achieve more, and have a healthy work life.
